detail: Constrained Latent Left Linking Model incorporates domain knowledge-based constraints, enhancing NECO's coreference resolution and named-entity linking capabilities.
problem_addressed: Limited effectiveness of sieve-based models in handling complex coreference scenarios
evidence: The CL3M model extends the sieve-based approach by adding domain knowledge-based constraints, which improves the performance of coreference resolution and named-entity linking tasks.
